text: Kɛlɛ folo lɔfelasiɛi ɠa ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɗa-ƓALAGI ná-dooɠo foloi. Mina boti nɔpɛ kɛ ma, ɗa-o, è-loun zunuiti-yo, è-loun anzanuiti-yo, ɗa-wotiɠɛ zunuiti-yo, ɗa-wotiɠɛ anzanuiti-yo, ɗa-wotiɠɛ nikɛiti-yo, ɗa-zoovalegiti-yo, anɛɛ ɗa-loganiiti kpein, anɛɛ wɛɛinti niiti ti zeini è ɠɔɠɔma, naa ɠa a kɛ, ɗa-wotiɠɛ zunuiti ta ɗa-wotiɠɛ anzanuiti ti la looɠo ga è ɠɛʋele.
